channel.title: RuneState 06 Remake [pi]
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ngfuch.png[/img] [i]Hello and welcome to RuneState Topic.... RuneState was made because most rs Remakes are Hyperion based i want to make a new ReMake with just [pi] - Project insanity. This is not a leeched Version from Pi this is a complete remake from scratch.[/i] [u]About Me?:[/u]
My name is black birds0, i enjoy coding ive been coding for almost 3 years now. I also enjoy realsing Website templates etc.
Current Devoplers:
1.Black birds0 Source and Client sidded Coder 2. None [Client sidded coder] 3. None [WebMaster] 4. None [In-Game Mod]
5. None [Source Sidded coder] Applaction format: [b]A * means optional.[/b]
Name: Coding Years:[If applying for coder only] Email: Skype*: Comments:
[b]Goals:[/b] [ol][li]1,000 players[/li] [li]5,000 signed up[/li] [li]100% Runescape Dialog[/li] [li]100% Perfect Skilling[/li] [li]100% Miningames[/li][/ol] Website Links
http://runestate.org http://runestate.org/detail.php http://runestate.org/vote.php
---------------------- [b]Current Features.[/b] Green = Completed Red = Worrking on it. ---------------------- [i]Quests:[/i] Cook's Assistant:100% Lunar Diplomacy:100% Restless Ghost:100% Black Knight's Fortress Gertude's Cat [i]Combat:[/i] Magic:80% Need to add Lunar Mele: 100% Range: 100% [i]Skilling:[/i] Mining: 75% Agility: 50% Herblore:85% RuneCrafting: 100% [Real Rs RC] Thieving:100% Prayer: 100% Fishing:80% Slayer: 25% Cooking: 100% Farming:50% FireMaking:100% Rest is 100% [i]Minigames:[/i] PestControl: 0% Duel Arena: 100% Fight Pits: 100% Castle Wars: 0% Fight Waves: 100% [i]Other:[/i] Guilds: 50% BankPin System: 100% RuneScape Dialog: 5% Switching:100% [i]Website:[/i] Forum and Site integrated:100% Nice Forum template: 100% Online offline php script: 100% [b]Media of Website[/b] [img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/940/290db856f5b44e06be7b676.png[/img] [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/5750/034bc2c6ced54d8a92d29b1.png[/img] [img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/7871/f9225b10560d4a50aa0a5e0.png[/img] [b]Media In Game:[/b] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/9264/40dcbcc0ddff44e89084883.png[/img] [img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/1240/8ba5fb131f1443a7902ae62.png[/img] [img]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/1658/21da6cb6bf994023ab970a8.png[/img] [img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/4858/4d2c68d21a114ec3b206f5a.png[/img] [img]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/8598/c671e16c59324711a7e357b.png[/img] [img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/3285/4a003e9ff8794e09b7441ea.png[/img] [img]http://img253.imageshack.us/img253/2319/e9219fa1aa634b3a89d1de4.png[/img] [img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/4065/f687c39e5ea34c8a8f63f9b.png[/img] [img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/8318/96015cf110494c90b4b4db3.png[/img] [img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/3825/25691cc5bd1d415ca803792.png[/img] [b]Videos:[/b] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p486qJ9VrJM[/youtube] Name: Cedric
Coding years:[If applying for coder only]: 2.5years (Applying for Server sided Programmer, was learning Client sided.)
Email: Not public
Skype*: cedric.bellens
Comments: I’d like to join you because i’ve heard of you allot. I think we can form a good team since i have very much time and I can work good in a team.
I’ll send my time zone etc later when you added me on Skype.

Looking forward for a response!
-Dwarf

item.title: RuneState 06 Remake [pi]
item.dc:creator: @black_birds0 black birds0
item.description:
@black_birds0 wrote:

[center]

Hello and welcome to RuneState Topic… RuneState was made because most rs Remakes are Hyperion based
i want to make a new ReMake with just [pi] - Project insanity. This is not a leeched Version from Pi this is a complete remake from scratch.

About Me?:

My name is black birds0, i enjoy coding ive been coding for almost 3 years now. I also enjoy realsing Website templates etc.

Current Devoplers:

1.Black birds0 Source and Client sidded Coder 2. None [Client sidded coder] 3. None [WebMaster] 4. None [In-Game Mod]
5. None [Source Sidded coder]

Applaction format:
A * means optional.

Name: Coding Years:[If applying for coder only] Email: Skype*: Comments:

Goals:

[ol][li]1,000 players[/li]
[li]5,000 signed up[/li]
[li]100% Runescape Dialog[/li]
[li]100% Perfect Skilling[/li]
[li]100% Miningames[/li][/ol]

Website Links

http://runestate.org http://runestate.org/detail.php http://runestate.org/vote.php

Red = Worrking on it.
